THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON
04.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Perl
Bahai
Cr1.M.C.No.4723 of 2020 2 2021/KERI64
ORDER
Annexure II order passed under Section 451 Cr.P.C.
is under challenge. It is an interim order passed
under Section 451 Cr.P.C. Though it is not appealable,
a revision is maintainable. Since there is a provision
for redressing the grievance of the petitioner by way
of revision, it is not proper to exhaust the remedy
under Section 482 Cr.P.C. Reserving the right of
petitioner to exhaust the proper remedy, the present
Crl.M.C. is hereby dismissed.
Sd/-
P. SOMARAJAN
DMR/- JUDGE
